content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > love crocheting and connecting with > other makers join the sweet bee > crochet facebook group click > here 1 this fun and simple neck warmer uses an easy to remember stitch repeat making it ideal for working on between larger projects or while watching your favourite shows using only the basic stitches this neck warmer creates a pretty texture that looks lovely in any shade of worsted weight yarn personalize your version by making the length shorter or longer depending on your style **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - clear photos - special stitch tutorials - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 226 yards of worsted weight yarn to match the sizing in the pattern i used mary maxim woodlands in the plum mist colourway - 5mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products ** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
